=API for gen-html-docs=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.gen-html-docs))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_generate-documentation_libs) generate-documentation] [#(_generate-documentation-to-file_path_libs) generate-documentation-to-file] 

----
===(`_`generate-documentation`_` libs)===
<pre> Returns a string which is the HTML documentation for the libraries
named by libs. Libs is a vector of symbols identifying Clojure
libraries.</pre>
----
===(`_`generate-documentation-to-file`_` path libs)===
<pre> Calls generate-documentation on the libraries named by libs and
emits the generated HTML to the path named by path.</pre>
